r.d: The PEAR::Auth_HTTP class provides methods for creating an HTTP authentication system using PHP, that is similar to Apache's realm-based .htaccess authentication.
r.n: - Added sessionSharing option to use unique session id. Currently, this option is set to true by default to maintain backward compatibility. - Added setOption and getOption to set/get option value. - Starting with this release, HTTP Digest Authentication (RFC2617) is experimentally supported. The code for HTTP Digest Authentication is originally developed by Tom Pike.
